Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI has more 'time' to give detailed feedback, you can input every part of your work and ask it to compare with a rubric and assignment instructions. It allows me to improve my work before submitting it. Teachers are giving the feedback after the work is completed which means you can't action the feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from GenAI feels less personal and I find it easier to take on board and it doesn't sound personal instead more an analysis of the content i have written.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI covers everything in more detail, while teachers give more specific and personalised examples.
